attributes.title: Manifesting The Supreme Power Is Only A Simple Request Away!
attributes.description:
12 May 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S DIRECT MESSAGE FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*CREATE A POWERFUL COGNITION INVOKING THE SUPREME POWER PARAMASHIVA IN YOU AND UNCLUTCH FROM EVERYTHING YOU EXPERIENCE AS YOU AND WORLD.

*THIS IS THE DIRECT MOST POWERFUL TECHNIQUE, METHOD FOR YOU TO MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA.

*FIRST, CREATE THE SATYA SANKALPA - DEEP PRAYER - INVOKING PARAMASHIVA: “O MY LORD PARAMASHIVA! THE SUPREME POWER OF THE UNIVERSE, SUPREME OF THE COSMOS, THE MOST SUPREME EXISTENCE, PLEASE MANIFEST YOURSELF IN ME.”

*HE EXPECTS ONLY ONE THING FROM YOU: YOU REQUESTING HIM! NOT EVEN PRAYING! HE IS WAITING. HE IS AS MUCH IN LOVE WITH YOU AS MUCH AS YOU ARE IN LOVE WITH HIM. JUST SIMPLE REQUEST: “PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE, CAN YOU MANIFEST YOURSELF IN ME.”

*OFFERING THIS REQUEST, DECIDE TO UNCLUTCH FROM EVERYTHING YOU KNOW AS YOU AND THE WORLD. ABSOLUTE SUPREME UNCLUTCHING.

*IF JUST 10,000 PEOPLE CAN DO THIS ALL OVER THE WORLD, WE WILL GIVE A SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO THE HUMANITY. IT IS TOO CHEAP, SMALL A NUMBER - JUST 10,000 PEOPLE. I AM NOT ASKING MORE THAN THAT.

*AND FOR A NORMAL AVERAGE HUMAN BEING’S TOXIN LEVEL IN THE BODY AND MIND, WITHIN 3 MONTHS THEY CAN SUCCESSFULLY MANIFEST PARAMASIVA. NOTHING ELSE IS REQUIRED.

*IF YOU WANT TO REDUCE THE THREE MONTHS’ TIME AND MANIFEST QUICKLY, ONLY ONE THING: STOP TAKING SOLID FOOD. START HYDRATING YOUR BODY WITH LOT OF LIQUIDS LIKE NEEM JUICE, ORGANIC FRUIT JUICE, ARUGAMPUL JUICE, HERBS JUICE.

*LANGANAM PARAMA AUSHADAM: THAT IS THE ULTIMATE ALCHEMY MEDICINE. AUSHADAM DOES NOT MEAN MEDICINE - IT MEANS ALCHEMY MEDICINE.

*FASTING WITH THE INTENTION OF MANIFESTING PARAMASHIVA NOT ONLY DETOXES YOUR BODY, IT DETOXES LITERALLY YOUR DEEPER LAYERS LIKE PRANAMAYA SHAREERA, MANOMAYA SHAREERA, ANANDAMAYA SHAREERA, VIJNANAMAYA SHAREERA... WHOLE BRAIN GETS DETOXED.

*IT IS A STRAIGHT MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA TODAY MORNING. JUST DO THESE THREE INSTRUCTIONS:

REQUESTING PARAMASHIVA IN YOUR OWN LANGUAGE, NOT ANY SPECIFIC SANSKRIT MANTRA...ACTUALLY MY ANMARTHA PUJA IS A MIXTURE OF TAMIL, ENGLISH AND SANSKRIT! IT CAN BE YOUR OWN LANGUAGE OR MIXTURE OF TWO THREE LANGUAGES. SOME DEVOTEES WHEN THEY TALK TO ME, IT WILL BE LIKE SOME FIVE - SIX LANGUAGES!
AFTER REQUESTING, TRY TO UNCLUTCH AS INTENSELY AS POSSIBLE.
THIS IS JUST AN OPTION: IF YOU WANT TO FASTEN THE PROCESS OF MANIFESTING THE PROCESS OF PARAMASHIVA, THEN NO SOLID FOOD. JUST HYDRATE YOUR BODY WITH LIQUID JUICES AND FRUIT JUICES.

*IF 10,000 PEOPLE CAN DO THIS JUST FOR THREE MONTHS, WE CAN GIVE SUCH POWERFUL SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO WHOLE OF HUMANITY BECAUSE ALL OF US ARE INTERCONNECTED. WE ARE NOT ALL ISLANDS. THESE ARE ALL FUNDAMENTAL TRUTHS.

*WHEN YOU START UNCLUTCHING, KAILASA STARTS EXPERIENCING THE JOY, BLISS OF YOU UNCLUTCHING. NOTHING GOES WASTE IN THIS COSMOS. WHETHER YOU ENGAGE WITH POSITIVITY OR NEGATIVITY, BE AWARE OF THIS ONE TRUTH: NOTHING GOES WASTE. SO NEVER ENGAGE WITH NEGATIVITY.

*NEGATIVITY, DEMON IS SUCCESSFUL THE MOMENT YOU ENGAGE EVEN IN A SIMPLE CONVERSATION WITH HIM. YOU ARE GONE AND HE HAS WON! EVEN TO DENY HIM DO NOT ENGAGE WITH HIM. TURNING YOUR FACE WAY AND WIPING THE DEMON’S MEMORIES ABSOLUTELY, KEEPING YOU AWAY FROM THE KULLANARI, IS THE ONLY WAY YOU WILL WIN. EVEN IF YOU GET TEMPTED TO GET INTO THE CONVERSATION, HE HAS WON AND YOU ARE OVER.

*I AM REPEATING FROM THEN: EVEN ENGAGING WITH KULLA NARIS, RAKSHASAS, IS DANGEROUS FOR YOU. YOU ACCUMULATE UNNECESSARY KARMA. DON'T ENGAGE EVEN TO DENY OR FIGHT WITH HIM.

*ANY DELUSION, MAYA WINS OVER YOU THE MOMENT YOU ENGAGE IN CONVERSATION BECAUSE THEIR VERY LOGIC IS DIFFERENT AND THE LOGIC YOU NEED TO TRAVEL WITH IS DIFFERENT. THE MOMENT YOU ENGAGE WITH THEIR LOGIC, YOU LOST THE LIFE.

*GOOD OR BAD DOES NOT GO WASTE. SPEND YOUR TIME AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE WITH THE GOOD. IF NOT, FALL ASLEEP. DON'T EVEN ENGAGE WITH BAD - KULLA NARIS.
*YOU WANT ENLIGHTENMENT, KULLA NARIS DON'T. THEY ONLY WANT TO DESTROY YOU, THAT'S ALL.

*ESPECIALLY WITH THIS CORONA LOCKDOWN ALL OVER THE WORLD, IT IS TOO EASY TO SIT AND UNCLUTCH, I AM NOT THREATENING OR FRIGHTENING YOU GUYS, BUT THERE WILL BE LOCKDOWN THROUGHOUT THIS YEAR. IT MIGHT BE A RELIEF FOR A FEW DAYS BUT WHOLE YEAR 2020 WILL BE LOCKDOWN YEAR.

Read More At: www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/3866648556756299
